name: Pearls Tours and Travels
description: We are a duly recognized travel agency.
overview:
We are a duly recognized travel agency. We aim at promoting tourism in India by providing a variety of tour packages to all parts of India with all kinds of travel related services to make your tours memorable and enjoyable.

With long experience, our company is successful in offering the best travel related services to its clients.

We offer complete, cost effective and customized tour packages, showcasing India’s every aspect at its best.

Our primary services are :

Tour Packages - Coimbatore Online Travel Agency

We are one of the Coimbatore Online Travel Agency, we arrange a number of comprehensive tour packages covering cities, temples, beaches, wildlifes, monuments, pilgrimages, hillstations and festivals.

Our holiday package includes all the famous tourists spots and suits every budget.

Starting from Kashmir in the north to Kanyakumari in the south, Gujarat in the West to Kolkata in the east, all the remarkable sites are included in our packages. Hotel Reservation - Coimbatore Travel Agency

Coimbatore Travel Agency ,We also arranged the accommodation facilities in hotels of all categories for individual and groups in all parts of India.

With an extensive network of hotel booking services we offer discounted rates in all the hotels ranging from deluxe to standard hotels.

On request, we also provide stay in the houseboats and sanctuaries guest houses.

Car/Coach Rental - Travel Agency of Coimbatore India

Travel agency Of Coimbatore India - We offer car and coach rental services for hassle-free travel.

For sightseeing we boast a large fleet of cars like Ambassador, Tata Indica, Tata Sumo, Toyata Qualis, Maruti Suzuki, Fiat, Honda City, Mitsubishi Lancer, Mercedes- Benz and large coaches.

Only you have to inform us the place and time and our chauffeur along with the desired car will be there to receive you.

Air Ticketing - Travel Agency of Coimbatore India

Coimbatore Online Travel Agency, we do air ticketing services to our clients and customers.

All you have to do is inform us about the destinations and preferences and we will do the rest for you as soon as possible.

Documentation

We also assist you in documentation work regarding passport and visa.

We, on your behalf, make arrangements regarding documentation services to save your valuable time, ensuring comfort all the way long.

Infrastructure

Our workforce includes a team of well trained and dedicated professionals.

We also have a good network with other tour operators in the country who help us in air ticket bookings, hotels bookings and tour planning.

Clients

Our clientele includes individuals, groups, corporate houses and government organisations. Many multinational companies have availed of our services in the recent past and have become our clients.

Mission

Our main aim is to conserve the rich heritage of India and to present the Indian culture, religion, wildlife, pilgrimage in a unspoilt and unhindered way.

Book immediately to get the special discount offer before March 15th 2013.

Best regards
